article_text: After seeing five members of their team ejected, the Royals rallied for a three-run eighth inning. Kendrys Morales provided the defining blow with a two-run double off Oakland reliever Eric O’Flaherty. Cain had tied the game with an RBI double off O’Flaherty.

article_metadata.title: Royals rally to beat A’s 4-2, win series | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
Kendrys Morales provided the defining blow with a two-run double off Oakland reliever Eric O’Flaherty.
Cain had tied the game with an RBI double off O’Flaherty.
After seeing five members of their team ejected, the Royals rallied for a three-run eighth inning.
